name: BlindSide (KevinDurand)
description:
How long will you survive against the waves of monsters that want you dead? Unable to see them coming only when in your line of sight will you be able to see them.

Controls:

WS-move forward and backward

AD-turn left and right

Space-shoot

B-drop bomb detonates after 3 seconds

1/2/3 - to drop turret
